TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectiveScrollingGrid extends System.Windows.Controls.Grid

Docs.summary: A panel that can hold specified cells in place when the view is scrolled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SelectiveScrollingGrid is used as the panel for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> to hold the header, cells, and details.
